Image zoom Kris Jenner/Instagram

Unless you live under a (Kardashian-proof) rock, you’ve most likely heard about the time Jennifer Lawrence stripped down to nearly nothing in Kris Jenner’s closet a few weeks back. Lawrence spoke to Kim Kardashian about the incident on Jimmy Kimmel, and now, Steve Harvey is making sure it never goes unforgotten.

“There was a story that Jennifer Lawrence ended up naked in your closet a few weeks ago,” he said to Jenner during her appearance on his talk show.

Get push notifications with news, features and more.

Her response? Yes, that definitely happened. “She had some time off and I invited her over for dinner,” Jenner explains of how the night unfolded. “We started having a few cocktails and we were having so much fun. And so you know, as girls do when they all get together, we ended up in my closet – looking at clothes and some stuff and she started trying some stuff on.”

RELATED PHOTOS: Last Night’s Look: Love It or Leave It?

“There she is now, in my black sequin Tom Ford dress,” Jenner says, sharing a photo of Lawrence dressed in a black mini dress, leopard print coat and matching slippers.

Image zoom

Still unsatisfied with Jenner’s response, however, Harvey asks again: “How did she end up naked in this damn closet?”

“She just took off her jeans and went for it,” Jenner says, joking that it all went down after “22 martinis” (and sharing a video of the two dancing, martinis in hand, to prove it).

As for how they went from strangers to fast friends, Jenner explains that because Lawrence is such a huge fan of Keeping up With the Kardashians, Jenner agreed to surprise the actress her with her birthday cake a few years ago: “When I walked out with this cake she was so excited and so excited to see me, and then we had this little texting friendship from then on. It was fun. She’s such a great girl.”
title: Kris Jenner Talks Jennifer Lawrence Getting Naked in Her Closet
